page.title: 20My village, Slyne-with-Hest
page.content: I have lived in Slyne-with-Hest for about eight and a half years. It is a nice little village and is very quiet. Slyne-with-Hest is generally a safe place to live and away from the two main roads it is quiet.Slyne-with-Hest is close to the sea and surrounded by beautiful country side.I like it at Slyne-with-Hest as it is not as noisy as in London.You can get to busy places because Slyne-with-Hest is close to the M6 motorway.The thing I dislike about Slyne-with-Hest is that it is nearly always cold and wet.Despite this,I enjoy living in Slyne-with-Hest, because the people are kind and friendly, and it is a beautiful area. Michelle Harris.
